Class GateArmImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ControllerIoImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.DeviceImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.GateArmImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, ControllerIO, Device, GateArm, Storable
public class GateArmImpl extends DeviceImpl implements GateArm
A Gate Arm is a device for restricting access to a ramp on a road.
Author:
Douglas Lau

      public void sendInterlocks()
      Send gate arm interlock settings. Do not test checkEnabled since this is used to shut off interlocks when disabling gate arm system.
